snippet: Chief John Diaz of the Seattle police retired Monday as his department faces a court-overseen monitoring plan to address the use of force by officers.
abstract: Seattle Police Chief John Diaz retires as his department faces court-overseen monitoring plan to address use of force by officers.
lead_paragraph: Chief John Diaz of the Seattle police retired Monday as his department faces a court-overseen monitoring plan to address the use of force by officers.

headline.seo: Washington: Embattled Seattle Police Chief Retires
headline.main: Washington: Embattled Seattle Police Chief Retires
headline.print_headline: Washington: Embattled Seattle Police Chief Retires
